00031 ConfigDoc::ConfigDoc( ):        m_board_type( CVT_V1724),
00032                                                         m_input_clock(0),
00033                                                         m_PLL_mode(true),
00034                                                         m_clock_out_enable(false),
00035                                                         m_clock_out_delay(0),
00036                                                         m_clock_out_delay_enable(false),
00037                                                         m_vcxo_freq(1000),
00038                                                         m_is_dirty(false)

00049 bool ConfigDoc::Load( const wxString& filename)
00050 {
00051         /*
00052         Application setting file structure
00053         [MISC]
00054         |
00055         |- BOARD_TYPE= V1724
00056         |- BOARD_ADDRESS= 0x32100000
00057         |- INPUT_CLOCK_MHZ=10
00058         |- VCXO_FREQ_MHZ=1000
00059         |- PLL_MODE=1
00060         |- CLOCK_OUT_ENABLE=1
00061         |- CLOCK_OUT_DELAY= 0
00062         |- CLOCK_OUT_DELAY_ENABLE= 0
00063         |- CLOCK_OUT_DIVIDER= 1
00064         |- ADC_DIVIDER= 1
00065         */
00066 
00067 
00068         if( !::wxFileExists( filename))
00069         {
00070                 wxString msg= wxString::Format( "Cannot find configuration file '%s'\n", filename.c_str());
00071                 wxLogError( msg);
00072                 return false;
00073         }
00074 
00075         wxFileInputStream in_stream( filename);
00076         if( !in_stream.Ok())
00077         {
00078                 wxString msg= wxString::Format( "Errors opening configuration file '%s'\n", filename.c_str());
00079                 wxLogError( msg);
00080                 return false;
00081         }
00082 
00083         wxFileConfig config( in_stream) ;
00084 
00085         //
00086         // Get the board type
00087         this->m_board_type= CVT_V1724;
00088 
00089         wxString board_type_string= _("");
00090         config.Read( _("/MISC/BOARD_TYPE"), &board_type_string, _("V1724"));
00091         // A board was specified : create a board of proper type
00092         if( !board_type_string.Trim().CmpNoCase( _("V1724")))
00093         {
00094                 // V1724
00095                 this->m_board_type= CVT_V1724;
00096         }
00097         else if( !board_type_string.Trim().CmpNoCase( _("V1721")))
00098         {
00099                 // V1721
00100                 this->m_board_type= CVT_V1721;
00101         }
00102         else if( !board_type_string.Trim().CmpNoCase( _("V1720")))
00103         {
00104                 // V1720
00105                 this->m_board_type= CVT_V1720;
00106         }
00107         else if( !board_type_string.Trim().CmpNoCase( _("V1731")))
00108         {
00109                 // V1731 Not DES mode
00110                 this->m_board_type= CVT_V1731;
00111         }
00112         else if( !board_type_string.Trim().CmpNoCase( _("V1740")))
00113         {
00114                 // V1740
00115                 this->m_board_type= CVT_V1740;
00116         }
00117         else
00118         {
00119                 // Unknown board type
00120                 wxLogError( wxString::Format( "Unknown board type '%s'\n", board_type_string.c_str()));
00121                 // return false;
00122         }
00123 
00124         //
00125         // Get the board address
00126         wxString board_add_string= _("");
00127         config.Read( _("/MISC/ADDRESS"), &board_add_string, _("0"));
00128         unsigned long board_add= 0;
00129         wxString hex_part;
00130         if( board_add_string.Upper().StartsWith(_("0X"), &hex_part))
00131         {
00132                 // Hex format
00133                 if( !hex_part.Trim().ToULong( &board_add, 16))
00134                 {
00135                         board_add= 0;
00136                 }
00137         }
00138         else
00139         {
00140                 // Decimal format
00141                 if( !board_add_string.Trim().ToULong( &board_add, 10))
00142                 {
00143                         board_add= 0;
00144                 }
00145         }
00146         this->m_board_base_address= (UINT32)board_add;
00147 
00148         config.Read( _("/MISC/INPUT_CLOCK_MHZ"), &this->m_input_clock, 100);
00149         config.Read( _("/MISC/VCXO_FREQ_MHZ"), &this->m_vcxo_freq, 1000);
00150         int tmp= 0;
00151         config.Read( _("/MISC/PLL_MODE"), &tmp, 1);
00152         this->m_PLL_mode= tmp!= 0;
00153         config.Read( _("/MISC/CLOCK_OUT_ENABLE"), &tmp, 0);
00154         this->m_clock_out_enable= tmp!= 0;
00155         config.Read( _("/MISC/CLOCK_OUT_DELAY"), &this->m_clock_out_delay, 0);
00156         config.Read( _("/MISC/CLOCK_OUT_DELAY_ENABLE"), &tmp, 0);
00157         this->m_clock_out_delay_enable= tmp!= 0;
00158         config.Read( _("/MISC/CLOCK_OUT_DIVIDER"), &this->m_clock_out_divider, 1);
00159         config.Read( _("/MISC/ADC_DIVIDER"), &this->m_adc_divider, 1);
00160 
00161         this->m_is_dirty= false;
00162         this->m_filename= filename;
00163         return true;
00164 }
00165 
00166 bool ConfigDoc::Save( )
00167 {
00168         return this->Save( this->m_filename);
00169 }
00173 bool ConfigDoc::Save( const wxString& filename)
00174 {
00175         /*
00176         Application setting file structure
00177         [MISC]
00178         |
00179         |- BOARD_TYPE= V1724
00180         |- BOARD_ADDRESS= 0x32100000
00181         |- INPUT_CLOCK_MHZ=10
00182         |- VCXO_FREQ_MHZ=1000
00183         |- PLL_MODE=1
00184         |- CLOCK_OUT_ENABLE=1
00185         |- CLOCK_OUT_DELAY= 0
00186         |- CLOCK_OUT_DELAY_ENABLE= 0
00187         |- CLOCK_OUT_DIVIDER= 1
00188         |- ADC_DIVIDER= 1
00189         */
00190 
00191         wxFileOutputStream out_stream( filename);
00192         if( !out_stream.Ok())
00193         {
00194                 wxString msg= wxString::Format( "Errors creating configuration file '%s'\n", filename.c_str());
00195                 wxLogError( msg);
00196                 return false;
00197         }
00198         wxFileInputStream in_stream( filename);
00199         if( !in_stream.Ok())
00200         {
00201                 wxString msg= wxString::Format( "Errors creating configuration file '%s'\n", filename.c_str());
00202                 wxLogError( msg);
00203                 return false;
00204         }
00205 
00206         wxFileConfig config( in_stream) ;
00207         //
00208         // Delete groups
00209         wxString group_id;
00210         long group_index;
00211         while( config.GetFirstGroup( group_id, group_index))
00212         {
00213                 config.DeleteGroup( group_id);
00214         }
00215 
00216         //
00217         // Set the board type
00218         switch( this->m_board_type)
00219         {
00220         case CVT_V1724:
00221                 if( !config.Write( _("/MISC/BOARD_TYPE"), _("V1724")))
00222                         return false;
00223                 break;
00224         case CVT_V1721:
00225                 if( !config.Write( _("/MISC/BOARD_TYPE"), _("V1721")))
00226                         return false;
00227                 break;
00228         case CVT_V1720:
00229                 if( !config.Write( _("/MISC/BOARD_TYPE"), _("V1720")))
00230                         return false;
00231                 break;
00232         case CVT_V1731:
00233                 if( !config.Write( _("/MISC/BOARD_TYPE"), _("V1731")))
00234                         return false;
00235                 break;
00236         case CVT_V1740:
00237                 if( !config.Write( _("/MISC/BOARD_TYPE"), _("V1740")))
00238                         return false;
00239                 break;
00240         default:
00241                 wxLogError( wxString::Format( "Unknown board type '%d'\n", this->m_board_type));
00242                 break;
00243         }
00244         //
00245         // Set the board address
00246         wxString board_add_string= wxString::Format( "0x%08x", this->m_board_base_address);
00247         if( !config.Write( _("/MISC/ADDRESS"), board_add_string))
00248                 return false;
00249         if( !config.Write( _("/MISC/INPUT_CLOCK_MHZ"), this->m_input_clock))
00250                 return false;
00251         if( !config.Write( _("/MISC/VCXO_FREQ_MHZ"), this->m_vcxo_freq))
00252                 return false;
00253         if( !config.Write( _("/MISC/PLL_MODE"), this->m_PLL_mode? 1: 0))
00254                 return false;
00255         if( !config.Write( _("/MISC/CLOCK_OUT_ENABLE"), this->m_clock_out_enable? 1: 0))
00256                 return false;
00257         if( !config.Write( _("/MISC/CLOCK_OUT_DELAY"), this->m_clock_out_delay))
00258                 return false;
00259         if( !config.Write( _("/MISC/CLOCK_OUT_DELAY_ENABLE"), this->m_clock_out_delay_enable? 1: 0))
00260                 return false;
00261         if( !config.Write( _("/MISC/CLOCK_OUT_DIVIDER"), this->m_clock_out_divider))
00262                 return false;
00263         if( !config.Write( _("/MISC/ADC_DIVIDER"), this->m_adc_divider))
00264                 return false;
00265         
00266         if( !config.Save( out_stream))
00267         {
00268                 wxString msg= wxString::Format( "Errors saving configuration file '%s'\n", filename.c_str());
00269                 wxLogError( msg);
00270                 return false;
00271         }
00272         this->m_is_dirty= false;
00273         return true;
00274 }
